verdict.summary: Pre-commit hook (linting, formatting, tests) found issues and blocked the commit.

dead_ends.why_fails: Skips all quality checks — defeats the purpose of hooks

workarounds.action: Fix the issues the hook reported — run the linter/formatter manually
workarounds.how: Fix the issues the hook reported — run the linter/formatter manually

workarounds.action: Run the hook manually to see detailed output: .git/hooks/pre-commit
If false positive, use --no-verify for this one commit only
workarounds.how:
# Skip hooks for this one commit only:
git commit --no-verify -m 'commit message'

# Only use this if you've verified the hook failure is a false positive
# and plan to fix the hook issue separately

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'pre-commit hook failed (add --no-verify to bypass)' is a hook_error error while 'fatal' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
